channel.title: Half-Life 2: DM server with HL1 maps
channel.description:
Join us @ * BLACK MESA 2 0 1 2 HL1 : DM : S ONLY [Votes|FastDL] connect 86.101.39.52:27015
20slot | located: eu | only hl1 :s ource maps | no low gravity | oldscool gameplay
[url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4-9qx3m-IKE[/url]

item.title: Half-Life 2: DM server with HL1 maps
item.dc:creator: PumaB
item.description:
Kenwood75:

That’s real great and all, but how do I install 'em? I’ve tried putting them into C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps*Username_here*\half-life 2 deathmatch\hl2mp\maps

That didn’t work! What am I doing wrong?

did u get missing map error on server?
actually u have to unrar the .Bz2 files and place the bsp files in map folder

Read full topic
item.source: Half-Life 2: DM server with HL1 maps

item.title: Half-Life 2: DM server with HL1 maps
item.dc:creator: Kenwood75
item.description:
PumaB:

New fastdownload fileserver added

You can see the list or download maps from here or from server ingame.

https://www.pumab.liquidserve.net/hl2mp/maps/

That’s real great and all, but how do I install 'em? I’ve tried putting them into C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps*Username_here*\half-life 2 deathmatch\hl2mp\maps

That didn’t work! What am I doing wrong?

Read full topic

item.title: Half-Life 2: DM server with HL1 maps
item.dc:creator: chrisc44890
item.description:
Ramirezoid:

HLDMS is waaaayyyy more fun than hl2dm. But nobody plays it. There are zero servers.

I was expecting this server to be maps ripped from HLDMS, but so far it’s been said maps remade in the vein of Black Mesa.

a few of the stock maps in hl2DM are remakes, except they’re interesting because the theme has been changed to that of HL2.

they are?!?!?!?!?! i need to know of which ones are so i can play them more

Yes Robert:

hahaha same! but my PC didn’t crash

it wasnt my PC it was HL2DM

Read full topic
